articles.title: OBITUARY E.O. Wilson, naturalist dubbed a modern-day Darwin, dies at 92 - Reuters
articles.description: E.O. Wilson, an American naturalist dubbed the modern day Darwin whose interest in ants led him to conclusions about human nature being directed by genetics rather than culture, died on Sunday at the age of 92, his foundation said.
